How it works

Upload your content

We'll need your raw audio, and some information about what you want.

Provide feedback

Edit a transcription of your podcast. Tell us what changes we should make. We'll take care of all the 'ahs', 'ums' and audio quality.

Publish to your customers

Once you've approved the final version, we'll automatically host, publish and distribute your podcast.
